atlas_icons.description: An array of images to load for use in tooltips or card text. Each image should ideally be 24x24 and if used for status/trigger tooltips the ID must match the ID of the sprite used.

id.description: If this references a status effect icon or trigger icon, the ID must exactly match with the ID in the sprites section.

buff_effect.description: Required param only for CardTriggerBuffEffect, this references which CardEffect in Card.effects is the target of the "buff" the param_int of that card effect will be modified with the value given in this CardTrigger. This also resets the CardEffect at the end of battle (THe card must have only 1 effect).

trigger_effect.description: Reference to ICardTriggerEffect to be played when triggered.

mod_reference.description: Mod GUID to search for a custom effect. If not specified then your Mod's assembly is searched.

name.description: The EffectStateName, this should be the name of a Class inheriting from CardEffectBase. Trainworks will search your mod for the class, then the base game.

prefab.description: GameObject Reference, should be imported as Map Node Icon.

merchant_screen_prefab.description: Game Object Reference, should be imported as Merchant Screen Content

rewards.description: Reward Data Reference, should be imported as Merchant Reward Data

name.description: The RoomStateModifierClassName, this should be the name of a class inheriting from RoomStateModifierBase. Trainworks will search your mod for the class, then the base game.

mod_reference.description: Mod GUID to search for a custom room modifier. If not specified then your Mod's assembly is searched.

id.description: The statusID of your status effect, this needs to be a lowercase and unique string. In your StatusEffectState subclass the statusId must be set to {modguid}-statuseffect-{id} as a lowercase string.

class_name.description: Class name associated with this status effect. Must be the name of a class in your Plugin inheriting from StatusEffectState.

icon.description: From section sprites, must reference the id of a sprite sized 24x24 that has a transparent background and white. For display in tooltips an atlas_sprite must be given (with the same ID) a black and white image of the same size.

names.description: Used when the status effect is nonstackable. The text that displays when applied on a card.

stackable_names.description: Used when the status effect is stackable. The text that displays when applied on a card. Usually <nobr>NameOfStatusEffect {0}</nobr>

card_tooltips.description: Tooltip text describing the status effect when mousing over a card.

character_tooltips.description: Tooltip text describing the status effect when mousing over a character that has had the status applied to it.

trigger_stage.description: Controls when the game calls TestTrigger/OnTriggered on your status effect class.

mod_reference.description: Mod GUID to search for a custom trait. If not specified then your Mod's assembly is searched.

name.description: The TraitStateName, this should be the name of a Class inheriting from CardTraitState. Trainworks will search your mod for the class, then the base game.
